tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE scientific_literature (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(100),
    publication_date DATE,
    keywords VARCHAR(255),
    citations INT
)

CREATE TABLE publications (
  publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  publication_title TEXT,
  publication_year INT,
  author_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (author_id) REFERENCES authors(author_id)
);

CREATE TABLE articles (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    article_title TEXT NOT NULL,
    keywords TEXT,
    author_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (author_id) REFERENCES authors(author_id)
);

CREATE TABLE citations (
    citation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    citing_article_id INT,
    cited_article_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (citing_article_id) REFERENCES articles(article_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (cited_article_id) REFERENCES articles(article_id)
);
